pullRequest.title: upgrade the vm service protocol library
pullRequest.bodyText:
upgrade the vm service protocol library

This brings in the latest version of the (generated) vm service protocol library, and adapts our debugger code for the relatively minor changes.
Note that the new version of the vm service protocol library is now forward compatible with major version changes of the protocol; we'll try and work with any version of the protocol.

commit.message: upgrade the vm service protocol library

nodes.bodyText: can we update EMPTY_SUCCESS_CONSUMER or provide a new empty one for this case and the one starting on line 493?
nit: seems like surprising formatting. has the formatter been run?
